description: Main entry point and app setup for a Flutter application named 'Pluto'. It initializes services, provides global state management, and defines the app's main widget structure, including navigation and theming.

classes.name: PlutoApp
classes.description: StatelessWidget that sets up the main MaterialApp, theme, and state providers for the application.

classes.name: PlutoHome
classes.description: StatefulWidget that manages the main navigation tabs and app bar for the home screen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, retrieves premium status from shared preferences, and runs the main app widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the PlutoApp, setting up providers and theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main scaffold with app bar, navigation bar, and content tabs for the home screen.
